General.Name: Zhejiang Benli Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Zhejiang Benli Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of pharmaceutical, pesticide, and other material intermediates. The company's products include N,N-Dimethylamino ethyl acrylate; 2,4-Dichloro-5-fluorobenzoyl chloride; 2-(2,4-Dichloro-5-fluorobenzoyl)-3-cyclopropylamino acrylate ethyl ester; 1-Ethyl-7-(1-piperazinyl)-6-fluoro-1,4-dihydro-4-oxo-3-quinolinecarboxylic acid hydrochloride; 2,4-Dichlorofluorobenzene; Methyl 3-Methoxyacrylate; Ethyl 3-ethoxyacrylate; 2,6-Dichlorofluorobenzene; 4-tert-Butylbenzoyl chloride; and 2, 4, 6-Trimethylbenzoyl chloride. It also exports its products to India, Japan, and internationally. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Linhai, China.
General.Address: No. 15 Donghai Sixth Avenue, Linhai, China, 317016
